item.title: Martin Luther King, Jr. - I Have a Dream
item.description:
I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character.

Martin Luther King, Jr. - I Have a Dream
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Edison Chen Speaks about Entrepreneurship
item.description:
I think one of the most important things is how to mesh what you know and try to bring it to a larger conversation so that everyone does not have to change what they want to do. People may not understand what youâ€™re talking about or what youâ€™re thinking, but if you have a good idea, sooner or later, they are going to jump on and start to give you a praise.
